definition: oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: The ally of the working class was the peasantry.
sentences.chinese: 工人阶级的同盟军是农民阶级。

sentences.english: Rieekan later served the Alliance as a line officer.
sentences.chinese: 里肯后来作为作战部队的军官在同盟军中服役。

sentences.english: The Confederate soldiers thought they were firing on Union officers.
sentences.chinese: 同盟军的士兵们都认为他们正在射击的是联盟军部将。

sentences.english: Confederate forces under Braxton Bragg defeated Union forces.
sentences.chinese: 布拉格统治下的同盟军打败了联邦军队。

sentences.english: Checkpoint Charlie was designated as the single crossing point for foreigners and members of the Allied forces.
sentences.chinese: 查理检查站是用来给外国人，同盟军通过的唯一通道。

sentences.english: The ships of the Athenians and their allies sulked unhelpfully.
sentences.chinese: 雅典人及其同盟军的船只袖手旁观。

sentences.english: China is impoverished North Korea's biggest benefactor and its only major ally.
sentences.chinese: 中国是贫穷的北韩最大的支持者和唯一的同盟军。

definition: expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
a front (militant group)/line of battle/alignment (towards a political party etc)
